config.allowUsageExplanation: The following settings can be used to manage the use of the app. If no configuration is made, all users are allowed. An explicit entry in the list of allowed users always has access, regardless of the roles.
config.allowUsersWithRoleText: Allow usage for users with the following roles:
config.confirmRemoveConfig: Do you really want to remove the configuration?
config.rolesAndUsersAreExclusive: If there are users in the allow list, roles will not be checked

main.needsAtLeastUserManager: To use this app, you need at least the 'User Manager' role.

results.copyInfo: If this numbers seem incorrect, use the 'compare function' to check if the source user has duplicate roles. Duplicate roles are reduced during copying.
results.title: Results

main.rolesCopyToTargetInfo: Roles will be copied to this user
main.selectTargetUserInfo: Select the target user by navigating to a user record in Alma.
main.successAlert: Successfully copied user roles. For further information, see 'Results'.
main.userIsNotAllowedInfo: You don't have the permission to use this app.

validationDialog.introText: Validation of roles failed: Not all roles of this user are valid.
validationDialog.outroText: If you press 'Select user', the roles will be copied in small groups, in order to find and skip the invalid ones. This could take a while.
validationDialog.title: Warning, not all roles are valid
